name: Mercator's Map of the British Isles (1564)
description: Gerard Mercator's large wall map of the British Isles. Among the most accurate 16th-century maps of Britain, showing Lancashire and Manchester.
notes:
Gerard Mercator (1512-1594), pioneer of modern cartography.
'Angliae, Scotiae et Hiberniae nova descriptio' (1564).
Large wall map, highly influential.
Showed Lancashire in reasonable detail for the era.
Later incorporated into Mercator's Atlas (1595, posthumous).
